description: Try our easy to follow Lemony Frozen Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Frozen yoghurt,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Lemony Frozen Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine caster sugar and cup water in a saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Stir until sugar has dissolved then remove from the heat and cool.
Line a deep tray or roasting pan with plastic wrap. Combine cooled syrup in a bowl with yoghurt, lemon zest and lemon juice and vanilla seeds. Pour into lined pan. Freeze for 4 hours or overnight.

Remove from the freezer and break up frozen mixture with a large spoon. Transfer to a food processor and process until smooth. Transfer to a 1L freezer-safe container and freeze for a further 4 hours or overnight. Serve scoops of the sorbet with lemon slices or in lemon halves (see tip).
